opencard.opt.security

Interface PKACredential

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Credential
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DSASignCredential

    public interface PKACredential
extends Credential
    Public key algorithm (PKA) credential. This tag interface allows card services or other credential users to distinguish PKA (asymmetric) credentials from symmetric credentials.
    For an example which uses this tag interface see RSASignCredential.
    See Also:
    SymmetricCredential, Credential
